title: Hydrogen power
brief_description: Looks at the developments and associated problems of using hydrogen as an alternative fuel indicating that hydrogen-fuelled cars look very favourable for the future. The film also shows the problems (and proposed solutions) for the storage of hydrogen, an alternative ways to produce hydrogen.
